name: Intergalactic Personnel Recovery System
description:
Lost in the void of space? Under fire from enemy combatants? Spaceship’s space tires out of space air? Worry not. The Intergalactic Personnel Recovery System is designed to intercept distress transmissions, and guide our highly trained staff to dispatch emergency units to your location… if they can find you.

Solve all of the riddles and puzzles presented to you through the various panel interfaces in order to rescue the souls lost in the dark, empty void. Get the coordinates correct and get paid. Get the coordinates wrong and get fired!

Warning! This game has flashing and bright colors that may make some users experience discomfort. If you feel any discomfort during play, please stop the game immediately.

Created for the 2021 Global Game Jam 

Theme: Lost and Found
